Uses of Class
org.smartfrog.tools.ant.TaskBase

Uses of TaskBase in org.smartfrog.tools.ant
 

Subclasses of TaskBase in org.smartfrog.tools.ant
 class DeployingTaskBase
          This class is used as an extended base for those tasks that do deployment, as it supports declaring of applications as nested elements.
 class Parse
          This task parses smartfrog files and validates them.
 class PingTask
          Probe the health of a deployed application.
 class RunApplicationTask
          Run an application by deploying it locally; only return from ant after it has finished.
 class SmartFrogTask
          Class to let ant task derivatives run smartfrog.
 class StartApplication
          Start an SF application, an application which will run asynchronously until stopped by another mechanism.
 class StartDaemon
          Start a daemon.
 class StartManagementConsole
          Start the SmartFrog management console
 class StartSmartFrogGui
          Start the smartfrog editor/management GUI
 class StopApplication
          Undeploy any smartfrog application from a running daemon.
 class StopDaemon
          Ant task to stop a smartfrog daemon on a host As the daemon is just another process, this is implemented as a call to shut down the application named 'rootProcess'.
 

Constructors in org.smartfrog.tools.ant with parameters of type TaskBase
DeployingTaskBase.Application(TaskBase owner)
          Create a bound application
